data_sources.description: Contains RLE (Run-Length Encoding) data for masks for pneumonia segmentation.
DICOM images for training data related to pneumothorax.
Contains mask annotations for images used in training.

data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing RLE encoding of masks for selected images.

data_variables.name: sample_files
data_variables.description: List of sample DICOM files directories in the training dataset.

data_variables.name: train_fns
data_variables.description: List of file paths for the training DICOM images.

data_variables.name: df_mask_dist
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing image IDs and counts of their annotations.

data_variables.name: complete_image
data_variables.description: Image array that combines and displays selected training images.

data_variables.name: complete_image_masked
data_variables.description: Image array that includes masks superimposed on the training images.

data_flow.creation: Created by reading train-rle-sample.csv using pd.read_csv.
data_flow.usage: Used to visualize annotations and as a source for image masks.

data_flow.creation: Populated using glob to find all .dcm files in the sample images directory.
data_flow.usage: Used to iterate over and load images into an array.

data_flow.creation: Acquired file paths using glob for training DICOM images.
data_flow.usage: Used to read image data for modeling and visualization.

data_flow.creation: Created by processing and merging counts of masks into existing mask DataFrame.
data_flow.usage: Used for filtering and analyzing datasets based on mask annotations.

data_flow.creation: Constructed using concatenated image tiles from loaded training images.
data_flow.usage: Displayed as a summarized visual representation of a set of images.

data_flow.creation: Generated by overlaying image masks onto the original images.
data_flow.usage: Displayed to show how masks correlate with the images they belong to.
